**Narrative:**  
Explain what happened in plain words. Be concise.

**Acknowledgment:**  
I understand that filing this issue creates a PUBLIC record. I consent to the Royal Decree logging this claim and making it visible. I understand "Under Review™" means this issue may be kept open or closed for up to 90 days and that no immediate admin action is guaranteed.
